tests.name: Sum of squares
tests.description: Calculate sum of squares of two numbers
tests.expression: (defun sum-of-squares (a b) (+ (* a a) (* b b)))

tests.name: Max of two numbers
tests.expression: (defun max2 (a b) (if (> a b) a b))

tests.name: Min of two numbers
tests.expression: (defun min2 (a b) (if (< a b) a b))

tests.name: Power function
tests.expression: (defun power (x n) (if (<= n 0) 1 (* x (power x (- n 1)))))

tests.name: GCD using Euclid
tests.expression: (defun gcd2 (a b) (if (= b 0) a (gcd2 b (- a (* (/ a b) b)))))

tests.name: Fibonacci iterative
tests.expression: (defun fib-iter (n a b count) (if (= count 0) b (fib-iter n b (+ a b) (- count 1))))

tests.name: Average of three
tests.expression: (defun avg3 (a b c) (/ (+ a b c) 3))

tests.name: Is triangle valid
tests.expression: (defun valid-triangle (a b c) (and (> (+ a b) c) (and (> (+ b c) a) (> (+ a c) b))))

tests.name: Clamp value
tests.description: Clamp value between min and max
tests.expression: (defun clamp (x min-val max-val) (if (< x min-val) min-val (if (> x max-val) max-val x)))
